Name: Worker Riot
About the game: A worker who has been left without a salary is a dangerous opponent. Armed with a hammer, he will not leave them alone. Help him defeat them all. Beat out of them everything they owe you for your work. WorkerRiot is a 2D platformer where you need to take revenge on your bosses for non-payment of debt. While you are busy with bosses, other workers are drilling the ground, be careful. By purchasing improvements in the store, you will make your work easier. Every worker should get his salary! Features of the game: - Pixel-Art - Music - Many levels - High Difficulty
